scripts.serve-dev: npm run build -- --watch | firebase serve --only functions --project distinc-dev
scripts.serve-prod: npm run build -- --watch | firebase serve --only functions --project distinc-9ad9d
scripts.serve-dev-to-local: npm run set-env-file .env.localdev && npm run serve-dev
scripts.serve-prod-to-local: npm run set-env-file .env.localprod && npm run serve-prod
scripts.serve-dev-to-deployed: npm run set-env-file .env.deploydev && npm run serve-dev
scripts.serve-prod-to-deployed: npm run set-env-file .env.deployprod && npm run serve-prod
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run set-env-file .env.deploydev && npm run build && firebase deploy --project distinc-dev --only functions:apiGateway
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run set-env-file .env.deployprod && npm run build && firebase deploy --project distinc-9ad9d --only functions:apiGateway
scripts.lint-and-ts-errors: concurrently "npm run ts-errors" "npm run lint" --success all --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --group --names "TS-ERROR-CHECK,LINT-ERROR-CHECK"
